q: Andy Coulson denies being aware of any wrongdoing at the paper, part of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp media group, and police said last month there was not enough evidence to charge him with any crime. Obviously when he was editor of the News of the World, bad things happened at that newspaper and when he found about those, he resigned. That was the right thing to do, David Cameron told BBC Radio 4's Today programme. ''I gave him a second chance,'' David Cameron added. ''I think he has done a good job for the government and for the country.

early peeks in The Washington Post and The New York Times at former Defense Donald Rumsfeld 's memoir, which goes on sale next week. A few highlights from the Post's report:- Donald Rumsfeld goes so far as to depict former President Bush as presiding over a national security process that was marked by incoherent decision-making and policy drift, most damagingly on the war in Iraq.- '' Donald Rumsfeld remains largely unapologetic about his overall handling of the Iraq conflict and concludes that the war has been worth the costs. As Ronald Reagan 's Mideast envoy, Donald Rumsfeld says he was sent to Baghdad because the country was the enemy of Iran and Syria, two nations that threatened the interests of the U.S., and there was a clear logic in trying to cultivate warmer relations with Saddam Hussein 's Iraq. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Jamaal Charles was chosen for the FedEx Award over Houston's Arian Foster , the NFL's leading rusher with 1,616 yards and a 4.9-yard average; and Atlanta's Michael Vick Turner, the third-leading rusher with 1,371 yards. I had a chance to do one Kansas City Chiefs game, it was the playoff game, said CBS Sports analyst Phil Simms , who presented the award. ''I was at practice, and I couldn't believe how fast Jamaal Charles was. TV lies. He's faster in person.'' Jamaal Charles
